modelCorrections.afterModification:
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1, maximum-scale=1, minimum-scale=1">
- Thought: The maximum-scale and minimum-scale values are set to 1, which disables zooming on mobile devices. According to WCAG 2.1, I need to remove these restrictions to allow users to zoom the content as needed.
- Corrected HTML: <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1">
modelCorrections.rawOutput:
- Incorrect HTML: <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1, maximum-scale=1, minimum-scale=1">

- Corrected HTML: <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1">
